column4: hey guys, how can i stop pulseaudio from start on my session? ive delete it from sessions and /etc/x11/xsession.d and /etc/xdg/autostart but it stils loads on login
yeah but it isnt at all... and i also delete those entries but it still loads...
i dont know if it could be some where else
go to system > preferences > sessions and try to disable pseudoaudio
